title: SMASH_VEHICLE_WINDOW
content:
0x9E5B5E4D2CCD22590xDDD9A8C2// SmashVehicleWindow
void SMASH_VEHICLE_WINDOW(Vehicle vehicle, int windowIndex);Parameters:vehicle: The vehicle id.windowIndex: Windows to smash index.Smashes a vehicles window. See eWindowId declared in IS_VEHICLE_WINDOW_INTACT.
codeBlocks:
// SmashVehicleWindow
void SMASH_VEHICLE_WINDOW(Vehicle vehicle, int windowIndex);

local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(PlayerPedId(), false)
-- Example usage for SMASH_VEHICLE_WINDOW
SmashVehicleWindow(vehicle, 0)
